title: Perioperative Dexmedetomidine and Postoperative Delirium
article: Su X, et al. Dexmedetomidine for Prevention of Delirium in Elderly Patients After Non-cardiac Surgery. Lancet 2016;388:1893-1902
description: Critical appraisal of this landmark RCT examining prophylactic low-dose dexmedetomidine infusion in elderly surgical patients. We'll focus on the study design, primary endpoints, and clinical applicability to our practice.

title: Regional Anesthesia in Anticoagulated Patients
article: Horlocker TT, et al. Regional Anesthesia in the Patient Receiving Antithrombotic or Thrombolytic Therapy. ASRA Guidelines 2018
description: Review of the current ASRA guidelines with case-based discussion on timing of neuraxial procedures in patients on various anticoagulants including DOACs.

title: POISE-3: Tranexamic Acid in Noncardiac Surgery
article: Devereaux PJ, et al. Tranexamic Acid in Patients Undergoing Noncardiac Surgery. NEJM 2022;386:1986-1997
description: Analysis of this large multicenter RCT examining TXA's effect on bleeding and cardiovascular outcomes. Discussion of implications for our perioperative blood management protocols.

title: Machine Learning for Hypotension Prediction
article: Hatib F, et al. Machine-learning Algorithm to Predict Hypotension Based on High-fidelity Arterial Pressure Waveform. Anesthesiology 2018;129:663-674
description: Exploration of AI/ML applications in anesthesiology, focusing on the Hypotension Prediction Index. We'll discuss validation studies and practical implementation considerations.

title: Sugammadex vs Neostigmine: A Meta-Analysis
article: Hristovska AM, et al. Efficacy and Safety of Sugammadex vs Neostigmine for Neuromuscular Blockade Reversal. Anesthesiology 2017;127:302-315
description: Systematic review of evidence comparing reversal agents. Focus on residual paralysis rates, respiratory complications, and cost-effectiveness analysis.

title: Goal-Directed Fluid Therapy in Major Surgery
article: Pearse RM, et al. Effect of a Perioperative, Cardiac Output-Guided Hemodynamic Therapy Algorithm on Outcomes. JAMA 2014;311:2181-2190
description: Critical evaluation of the OPTIMISE trial and its implications for intraoperative hemodynamic management. Discussion of current GDFT protocols and monitoring technologies.

title: Opioid-Free Anesthesia: Evidence and Practice
article: Lavand'homme P, Estebe JP. Opioid-free Anesthesia: A Different Regard to Anesthesia Practice. Curr Opin Anaesthesiol 2018;31:556-561
description: Comprehensive review of OFA techniques, multimodal analgesia protocols, and the evidence base for reducing perioperative opioid use.

title: Postoperative Cognitive Dysfunction: Current Understanding
article: Evered L, et al. Recommendations for the Nomenclature of Cognitive Change. Anesthesiology 2018;129:872-879
description: Discussion of the updated nomenclature for perioperative neurocognitive disorders, risk factors, and potential preventive strategies.
